Inset: Stern–Volmer plot of compound 1 quenched by Fe3+ aqueous solution.43–45(a) The fluorescence emission spectra of 1 in concentrations of Fe3+; (b) Benesi–Hildebrand plot of 1 assuming 1:1 stoichiometry between 1 and Fe3+ in water.
